title: Here after foloweth a lytell boke, whiche hath to name, Why come ye nat to courte compyled by maystr Skelton poete Laureate.
author: Skelton, John, 1460?-1529.
publisher: By [R. Copland for] me Richard kele dwellig [sic] in the powltry at the longe shop vnder saynt myldredes chyrch,
notes: Publisher's name and address from colophon; actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
